Original: That request is from a member of the
Carpenters Guild. He wants a [Color:5]tree root[Color:0]
to be used in a construction project.
[Page]
He specified that he wants the root
to come from a tree that grows in a
[Color:5]very windy area[Color:0].
[Page]
Tharsis has strong winds, but if he is
posting a request to explorers, I must
assume they are not strong enough.
[Page]
Have you come across any such place
in your travels? Well, I shall await
your swift return.
Translation: That request is from a member of the
Carpenters Guild. He wants a [Color:5]tree root[Color:0]
to be used in a construction project.
[Page]
He specified that he wants the root
to come from a tree that grows in a
[Color:5]very windy area[Color:0].
[Page]
Tharsis has strong winds, but if he is
posting a request to explorers, I must
assume they are not strong enough.
[Page]
Have you come across any such place
in your travels? Well, I shall await
your swift return.

Original: After accepting the request, it occurs
to you that the [Color:6][Number:0][Color:0] you
acquired in the Windy Archive will do.
[Page]
If you wish to complete the request
now, you can report in and deliver
the [Number:0].
Translation: After accepting the request, it occurs
to you that the [Color:6][Number:0][Color:0] you
acquired in the Windy Archive will do.
[Page]
If you wish to complete the request
now, you can report in and deliver
the [Number:0].

Original: Welcome back. Is this the tree root
the carpenter wanted? Very well.
I will keep it safe as I deliver it.
[Page]
I assume, since it comes from a place
called the Windy Archive, that the
winds were quite strong there...
[Page]
I pity any female explorers in skirts
who venture in. But regardless, I
again thank you for your hard work.
Translation: Welcome back. Is this the tree root
the carpenter wanted? Very well.
I will keep it safe as I deliver it.
[Page]
I assume, since it comes from a place
called the Windy Archive, that the
winds were quite strong there...
[Page]
I pity any female explorers in skirts
who venture in. But regardless, I
again thank you for your hard work.

Original: You recall accepting a quest at the
bar to acquire a tree root to be used
in construction...
[Page]
This tree root is withstanding the
fierce winds that blow against it.
You suspect the client would like it.
[Page]
If you wish to complete the request,
you can gather a sample now.
Translation: You recall accepting a quest at the
bar to acquire a tree root to be used
in construction...
[Page]
This tree root is withstanding the
fierce winds that blow against it.
You suspect the client would like it.
[Page]
If you wish to complete the request,
you can gather a sample now.

Original: You have obtained a [Color:6][Item:1218][Color:0].
It is quite sturdy, and should be just
what the client asked for.
[Page]
All that remains now is to bring it
back to the Dancing Peacock in order
to complete the quest!
Translation: You have obtained a [Color:6][Item:1218][Color:0].
It is quite sturdy, and should be just
what the client asked for.
[Page]
All that remains now is to bring it
back to the Dancing Peacock in order
to complete the quest!

Original: You recall taking a request involving
the retrieval of plant roots that
grew in a windswept area...
[Page]
The [Color:6][Item:1218][Color:0] you took is
currently among your possessions...
You must be careful not to sell it.
Translation: You recall taking a request involving
the retrieval of plant roots that
grew in a windswept area...
[Page]
The [Color:6][Item:1218][Color:0] you took is
currently among your possessions...
You must be careful not to sell it.

Original: [Color:3]Your map of the [Color:5]Windy Archive[Color:3] has
been updated.[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:3]Your map of the [Color:5]Windy Archive[Color:3] has
been updated.[Color:0]
